page.title: 05ECOLOGY
page.content: Thick sandstones and limestones comprise the North shore,shales with ironstone and coal seams,fossils of fish,molluscs & corals can be found here,Ebb's Neuk point is magnesium limestone 30 ft thick,which the lime kilns were built from. Bird life: Eiderducks, sea birds off shoot from the Farne Islands. Terns,Waders,Oyster catchers & Curlews.In winter large colonies of Golden Plover and Lapwings. Wild Flowers: a profusion of burnet rose,bloody cranesbill & harebells on the links.Sea_pinks(thrift) on the rocks.80 Wild orchis were counted in May beside car-park. Rocky north beach a haven for children to fish for crabs & small sea creatures.
